title: Fire Fauci? No Sports Until 2021? 4.14.20
itunes:title: Fire Fauci? No Sports Until 2021? 4.14.20
description:
In episode 608, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Zahra Noorbakhsh to discuss Dr. Fauci's future with the Trump administration, Trump coming up with his own D-team task force, vote-by-mail, the new Tiger King episode, Joe Exotic's music blowing up in Europe, how experts think we will be able to restart America, how the movie Jaws parallels our pandemic, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. MELTING GLACIERS AND THAWING PERMAFROST COULD RELEASE ANCIENT VIRUSES LOCKED AWAY FOR THOUSANDS OF YEARS
  2. See how coronavirus restrictions and rain have improved air quality
  3. April showers break records in L.A. County, with more rain and snow on the way
  4. Our Growing Food Demands Will Lead to More Corona-like Viruses
  5. Climate change and human health - risks and responses.
  6. What Dr. Fauci has coming
  7. 'I will decide when to re-open the country - soon': Donald Trump announces 'task-force' to make crucial call that includes Ivanka, Jared, White House aides AND Governors Cuomo and Whitmer
  8. New salvo in expanding political fight over vote-by-mail as Wisconsin results come in
  9. TEXAS TO EASE CORONAVIRUS LOCKDOWN UNDER EXECUTIVE ORDER TO 'RESTORE LIVELIHOODS,' GOVERNOR SAYS
  10. Joel McHale’s ‘Tiger King’ Aftershow Mauled by Viewers: “One of the Cheapest Pieces of Television I’ve Seen”
  11. JOE EXOTIC SPOTIFY MUSIC ON THE RISE ... Especially in Denmark!!!
  12. Restarting America Means People Will Die. So When Do We Do It
  13. The Pandemic Movie of Our Time Isn’t Contagion. It’s Jaws.
  14. How coronavirus advice from Boris Johnson has changed
  15. Boris Johnson's hero is the mayor who kept the beaches open in Jaws. That's fine by me
  16. We Are Watching the Probable Demise of Trump’s Reelection in Real Time
  17. Column: ‘You knew and now my boy is dead.’ Trump is as craven as the mayor in ‘Jaws’
  18. Florida judge strikes down lawsuit concerning safety at the beaches during COVID-19
  19. WATCH: Roberta Flack - Gone Away

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
